thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Conrad Korten

author: Conrad Korten
title: Conrad Korten
text:
We were looking at setting up an office in 2016 and Servcorp offered the perfect balance of being able to setup a small office with minimal commitment, and still have a professional and warm reception to greet our clients, plus the flexibility to grow with our needs.
As our company has grown, we have looked to expand and move to a new location, Servcorp went above and beyond with their support and we look forward to a long collaborative future with them.
